text: 23 is a collection of Bushido and Sido songs which was released on October 14, 2011 in three versions: Standard, Premium and Deluxe. The album reached number 1 in the German Amazon music charts and hip-hop charts. == Songs == * "Intro" * "Mit nem Lächeln" ("With a smile") * "Und schon wieder" ("And once again") * "So mach ich es" ("That's how I do it") * "Willy 1 (Skit)" * "Engel links Teufel rechts" ("Angel left devil right") * "Auch wenn es manchmal regnet" ("Still when it rains sometime") * "Erwachsen sein" ("To be adult") * "Bring mich heim" ("Bring me home") * "Ein Märchen" ("A fairytale") * "Willy 2 (Skit)" * "Haus aus Gold" ("House of gold") * "Schattenseiten" ("Shady sides") * "23" * "Verriegel deine Tür" ("Lock your door") * "Kopf kaputt" ("Head broken") * "Schöne neue Welt" ("Beautiful new world") ==References== Category:2011 albums
title: 23 (Bushido & Sido album)
